titleStmt.title: An Exact and true relation of the examination, tryal and condemnation of the German princesse, otherwise cal'd [sic] Mary Carleton, at Justice-Hall in the Old Bailey, January 17, 1672 also an account of the pretended treachery which she was to discover to the Bench, and the reason of her return from Jemeca.

An Exact and true relation of the examination, tryal and condemnation of the German princesse, otherwise cal'd [sic] Mary Carleton, at Justice-Hall in the Old Bailey, January 17, 1672 also an account of the pretended treachery which she was to discover to the Bench, and the reason of her return from Jemeca.

notesStmt.note: Mary Carleton was tried on a charge of theft.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
